name: Ardmore Flying School
about: Ardmore Flying School, established in 1961, is a premier aviation training institution in New Zealand, recognized internationally for its high standards in flight training. With NZQA and New Zealand Civil Aviation Authority approvals, the school offers comprehensive programs, including Level 5 and 6 diplomas in aviation, and a Modular Training Programme. Our fleet includes Cessna 172 and Diamond DA42 aircraft, supplemented by state-of-the-art simulators. Experienced instructors, many of whom are retired airline pilots, provide expert guidance. Located at Ardmore Airport, the school has trained over 22,000 pilots and is known for its commitment to safety, skill-building, and preparing students for rewarding careers in aviation. With a strong focus on excellence, Ardmore Flying School is the ideal launchpad for aspiring aviators.
